description: ztpd Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) configurator role configuration.
title: ztpd configurator configuration.

expirationTime.description: The global expiration time in minutes of bootstrapping records. If a specific provider does not specify an expiration time, this value is used.
expirationTime.title: Bootstrapping record expiration time (seconds).

providers.description: Array of supported bootstrapping information providers. Each bootstrapping information provider manages records which describe the enrollee devices the configurator is capable of proivisioning.
providers.title: Bootstrapping information providers.

anyOf.description: Bootstrapping information provider settings when type is 'file'.
anyOf.title: File-based bootstrapping information provider configuration.

type.description: The type of bootstrapping information provider.
type.title: Bootstrapping information provider type.

name.description: The name to associate with this instance of the bootstrapping information provider. This name will appear in log messages to identify the provider in question.
name.title: Bootstrapping information provider name.

expirationTime.description: The expiration time in minutes of bootstrapping records. If no value is specified, the records never expire and consequently will never be updated.
expirationTime.title: Bootstrapping information provider record expiration time (seconds).

path.description: The absolute filesystem path to the json file containing bootstrapping information.
path.title: Bootstrapping information file path.

decodingInfo.title: Bootstrapping provider information decoding map.
decodingInfo.description: Information describing how to map objects in the file to required Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) enrollee identification information.

pointer.description: A JSON pointer referencing the array that contains Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) enrollee identification.
pointer.title: Enrollee bootstrapping information array JSON pointer.

pointerBase.description: A JSON pointer, relative to the JSON pointer specified in the "pointer" property, referencing the sub-object containing the Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) enrollee identification information.
pointerBase.title: Enrollee bootstrapping information object JSON pointer.

propertyMap.description: A table of properties mapping JSON property names to required Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) values.
propertyMap.title: Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) Enrollee property map.

dppUri.description: The name of the JSON property which holds the Device Provisioning Protocol bootstrapping URI.
dppUri.title: Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) Bootstrapping URI property name.

publicKeyHash.description: The name of the JSON property which holds the Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) public bootstrapping key "chirp" hash.
publicKeyHash.title: Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP) Bootstrapping public key chirp hash name.

anyOf.description: Bootstrapping information provider settings when type is 'azuredps' and uses Shared Access Signature (SAS) token authentication.
anyOf.title: Azure Device Provisioning Service (DPS) based bootstrapping information provider configuration.

type.description: The type of bootstrapping information provider.
type.title: Bootstrapping information provider type.

name.description: The name to associate with this instance of the bootstrapping information provider. This name will appear in log messages to identify the provider in question.
name.title: Bootstrapping information provider name.

expirationTime.description: The expiration time in minutes of bootstrapping records. If no value is specified, the records never expire and consequently will never be updated.
expirationTime.title: Bootstrapping record expiration time (seconds).

serviceEndpointUri.description: The service endpoint URI of the Device Provisioning Service (DPS) instance.
serviceEndpointUri.title: Azure Device Provisioning Service (DPS) endpoint URI.

authentication.title: Shared Access Key (SAS) authentication configuration.
authentication.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

authorityUrl.description: The OAuth2 authority url endpoint which grants authorization tokens.
authorityUrl.title: SAS Authority URL.

connectionString.description: The connection string for the Device Provisioning Service (DPS) instance. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/iot-dps/quick-setup-auto-provision-cli#get-the-connection-string-for-the-iot-hub.
connectionString.title: SAS connection string.

anyOf.description: Bootstrapping information provider settings when type is 'azuredps' and uses Client Credential grant type OAuth2 authentication.
anyOf.title: Azure Device Provisioning Service (DPS) based bootstrapping information provider using OAuth2.

type.description: The type of bootstrapping information provider.
type.title: Bootstrapping information provider type.

name.description: The name to associate with this instance of the bootstrapping information provider. This name will appear in log messages to identify the provider in question.
name.title: Bootstrapping information provider name.

expirationTime.description: The expiration time in minutes of bootstrapping records. If no value is specified, the records never expire and consequently will never be updated.
expirationTime.title: Bootstrapping record expiration time (seconds).

serviceEndpointUri.description: The service endpoint URI of the Device Provisioning Service (DPS) instance.
serviceEndpointUri.title: Azure Device Provisioning Service (DPS) endpoint URI.

authentication.title: OAuth2 client credential grant type authentication configuration.
authentication.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

authorityUrl.description: The authority url endpoint which grants OAuth2 authorization tokens.
authorityUrl.title: OAuth2 authority URL.

clientId.description: The 'client_id' for client credential grant type OAuth2 authentication.
clientId.title: OAuth2 client identifier.

clientSecret.description: The 'client_secret' for client credential grant type OAuth2 authentication.
clientSecret.title: OAuth2 client secret.

resourceUri.default: The resource URI of the endpoint that can be accessed with the requested token.
resourceUri.title: OAuth2 resource URI.

network.configuration.description: Network provisioning information mapping network configuration information to enrollee identities.
network.configuration.title: Network configuration for provisioning.

default.description: The default network to provision when a specific network for an enrollee has not been configured.
default.title: Default network configuration.

ssid.description: The service set identifier (SSID) of the target network to provision.
ssid.title: Service Set Identifier (SSID).

ssidCharset.description: The value of the character set that would be used to convert the SSID octet string into characters. This must be an MIBenum value from https://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml.
ssidCharset.title: Service Set Identifier (SSID) character set.

credentials.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
credentials.title: Network credentials.

anyOf.description: The network configuration when a passphrase is specified.
anyOf.title: Network configuration for a passphrase.

akm.description: The authentication and key management scheme for the network.
akm.title: Network authentication and key management scheme.

passphrase.description: The passphrase for the network, encoded as ASCII.
passphrase.title: Network passphrase.

anyOf.description: The network configuration when a pre-shared key (psk) is specified.
anyOf.title: Network configuration for a pre-shared key.

akm.description: The authentication and key management scheme for the network.
akm.title: Network authentication and key management scheme.

psk.description: The pre-shared key (psk) for the network, encoded as hexadecimal.
psk.title: Network pre-shared key.
